title: comit
author: comit
content: Up for auction is this beautiful One Million Satoshi Bar by Alpen Coin.   The bar is gold plated and loaded with 0.01 BTChttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1DMV8nfEMtvhjszd6WYuuZugK7m61EsgKdIt comes in a plastic cover and a classy black box. The bar has only been out of its plastic - and handled with gloves - to take pictures, it is in pristine condition!Pictures!STARTING BID: 0.01 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTCEND TIME: TUESDAY, MAY 10st, 2022, 17:00:00 EDT COUNTDOWN TIMERSNIPE: Any higher bid made in last 10 minutes before the end time (17:00) will extend the auction to 17:10. In case of an extension to 17:10 any higher bid made as of 17:00 will extend the auction by 10 minutes, starting from the time of that bid. The auction ends when no higher bid is made in the 10 minute extension period. For example:* last bid at 16:49 => auction ends at 17:00 => higher bid at 17:01 is invalid* last bid at 16:51 => auction ends at 17:10 => higher bid at 17:09 is valid and wins the auction if no higher bids are made before 17:19* last bid at 16:51 => auction ends at 17:10 => higher bid at 17:01 => auction ends at 17:11SHIPPING: Based on location and shipping preference (bar is located in the EU)

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Just want to say these bars are amazing and look even better in person. From the box to the COA. Such a nice piece. Good luck to the bidders and to the victor goes the spoils.
